metaTitle: SOL DE SALINAS San Miguel de Salinas | From €245,000
metaDescription: Discover SOL DE SALINAS in San Miguel de Salinas, Alicante. Modern penthouses and apartments from €245,000. Delivery October 2026. Prime Costa Blanca location.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to SOL DE SALINAS, an exceptional new residential development in the heart of Pueblo, San Miguel de Salinas. This premium project showcases modern architecture and thoughtful design, offering 6 exclusive units featuring 2-3 bedroom penthouses and apartments priced from just €245,000. SOL DE SALINAS represents outstanding value in the Costa Blanca market, positioned 40% below typical Spanish island property prices while delivering superior quality and lifestyle amenities. Located in San Miguel de Salinas, a thriving international community where English is commonly spoken, this development combines contemporary comfort with strategic accessibility to beaches, golf courses, and essential services. With completion scheduled for October 1st, 2026, SOL DE SALINAS provides an ideal opportunity for buyers seeking investment potential with +8% year-on-year market growth, rental income possibilities at €800 per week, and the authentic Costa Blanca experience that makes this region increasingly popular among European property investors and lifestyle seekers.

locationSection.intro: Pueblo in San Miguel de Salinas represents one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations, offering the perfect balance between authentic Spanish living and modern international convenience. This established area attracts a diverse community of expatriates, retirees, and young families seeking a vibrant lifestyle with exceptional value. The region benefits from excellent infrastructure, world-class healthcare facilities including regional hospitals and English-speaking private clinics, and a comprehensive network of international schools featuring British curriculum options. Residents enjoy easy access to stunning Mediterranean beaches, championship golf courses, and thriving shopping centers. The established international community ensures English is widely spoken, making integration smooth for foreign buyers. San Miguel de Salinas has demonstrated consistent property market growth of 8% year-on-year, reflecting strong demand and genuine lifestyle appeal that extends far beyond typical tourist areas.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including prestigious clubs
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, English-speaking doctors available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional Spanish tapas to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: SOL DE SALINAS exemplifies contemporary Spanish construction standards with premium materials and meticulous attention to detail. Each unit combines spacious living areas with intelligent layouts designed for modern family life or investment purposes. Built sizes range from 91 to 141 square meters, accommodating both compact penthouses and larger family apartments. Construction incorporates modern building techniques with thermal efficiency as standard, ensuring comfort throughout the Mediterranean seasons. Quality finishes include contemporary ceramic flooring, modern bathroom fixtures with quality sanitaryware, and professionally fitted kitchens equipped with modern appliances. Every detail reflects the developer's commitment to creating homes that rival established Spanish markets while maintaining exceptional value.
features: Private and communal swimming pool facilities
Fitted kitchen with quality appliances included
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency
Private parking space for each unit
Professionally landscaped gardens and common areas

content.investmentSection: SOL DE SALINAS presents compelling investment potential in a market demonstrating consistent growth of 8% year-on-year. San Miguel de Salinas offers significant advantages over saturated Spanish island markets, with properties trading at approximately 40% discount while delivering superior quality and lifestyle benefits. The rental market remains robust, with 7-night holiday rentals averaging €800, providing excellent short-term income opportunities. Average property values in the area sit at €2,200 per square meter, representing exceptional value considering the location's amenities and market trajectory. The established international community ensures steady demand from both owner-occupiers and investors seeking reliable returns. With delivery scheduled for October 2026, early purchasers benefit from competitive pricing before completion, allowing potential appreciation during the construction phase. Property tax considerations remain favorable for foreign investors, and the region's growing popularity among Northern European buyers continues to strengthen long-term value prospects.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in SOL DE SALINAS?
faqs.answer: SOL DE SALINAS properties start from €245,000. The development offers penthouse and apartment options with 2-3 bedrooms and built sizes from 91 to 141 square meters. Current availability includes 6 units. Contact us via WhatsApp for detailed pricing on specific floor plans and current inventory.

faqs.question: When will SOL DE SALINAS be completed?
faqs.answer: SOL DE SALINAS is scheduled for completion on October 1st, 2026. The developer provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific unit delivery dates vary based on construction sequence. Contact our team for detailed delivery schedules for individual properties.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of SOL DE SALINAS?
faqs.answer: SOL DE SALINAS is developed by SOL DE SALINAS, an experienced builder with established credentials in San Miguel de Salinas and the surrounding Costa Blanca region. The developer demonstrates commitment to quality construction and customer satisfaction across their residential projects.

faqs.question: Is San Miguel de Salinas a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, San Miguel de Salinas is an excellent property market location. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, consistent property market growth of 8% year-on-year, and exceptional amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. The region offers authentic Spanish lifestyle combined with modern convenience and strong investment fundamentals.

faqs.question: How far is SOL DE SALINAS from the beach?
faqs.answer: SOL DE SALINAS is located within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches. The development's proximity to premium coastal areas makes beach access convenient for both daily recreation and weekend getaways, while maintaining peaceful residential surroundings away from tourist crowds.

faqs.question: What amenities are near SOL DE SALINAS?
faqs.answer: SOL DE SALINAS benefits from excellent nearby amenities including major supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), a regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, several championship golf courses, international schools featuring British curriculum, and diverse restaurants offering both traditional Spanish and international cuisine. The established community ensures comprehensive services catering to international residents.

content.conclusion: SOL DE SALINAS represents a rare opportunity to acquire premium Costa Blanca property at genuine value, combining modern construction standards, strategic location, and investment potential in one exceptional development. Whether seeking a Mediterranean lifestyle home, a holiday rental investment, or a retirement destination, this San Miguel de Salinas project delivers on all fronts. The established international community, excellent amenities, and consistent market growth provide confidence in both lifestyle satisfaction and long-term property value appreciation. With only 6 units available and completion in October 2026, SOL DE SALINAS offers limited opportunity for those ready to secure their Costa Blanca future. Contact our team today via WhatsApp to discuss availability, customize your property preferences, and take the first step toward making SOL DE SALINAS your new home or investment. Our multilingual specialists are ready to guide you through every aspect of the purchase process.
